verbs.description: [ARG1: Negotiations over a potential summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: seem] [C-ARG1: to mostly be about the meeting itself] . Hear the " Playing Politics " analysis from WCCO Radio 's Chad Hartman and the Star Tribune Editorial Board 's John Rash and Patricia Lopez .
